//Generated by BehavEd

rem ( "crush the fools" );

loop ( 2 )
{
	wait ( 200.000 );
	wait ( $random( 0, 9000 )$ );
	move ( $tag( "spikepos2", ORIGIN)$, < 0.000 0.000 0.000 >, 800.000 );
	wait ( 800.000 );
	use ( $get( STRING, "SET_PARM1")$ );
	wait ( 2000.000 );
	move ( $tag( "spikepos1", ORIGIN)$, < 0.000 0.000 0.000 >, 3000.000 );
	wait ( 3000.000 );
}
